title: Lucrece
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: Printed by Richard Field, for Iohn Harrison, and are to be sold at the signe of the white Greyhound in Paules Churh-yard [sic],
notes: Running title reads: The rape of Lucrece.
